ValidationRule.description: Ensures Industry and Phone is populated on Accounts created during Lead conversion and Title and Phone is populated on Contacts created during Lead conversion.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name <> "Vanguard", OR( ISBLANK(TEXT(Industry)), ISBLANK(Title), ISBLANK(Phone)), OR( TEXT(Status) = "Qualified", TEXT(Status) = "Converted", TEXT(Status) = "Working"), RecordType.Name = "BD Lightning")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Enter Job Title, Industry and Company Phone.
